resources.string: This device has no available location provider, as both GPS and Network locations are unavailable!
Password changing is disabled on this phone. Please enable in the SMSLocator app on the phone.
This device does not have premium features enabled. To do so, purchase the upgrade through the app.
The notification policy for SMSLocator has been revoked, thus Do-Not-Disturb mode was not changed.
Your free premium has expired. Either watch another video or purchase premium to use this command. Normal location requests are still available.
Audio enabled. Send "[Keyword] [pin] ring" to hear a noise.
An error occurred while trying to get your phone\'s location!
Your request could not be completed as app permissions have been revoked!
\nThis location was NOT retrieved using the GPS!
[SMSLocator] Battery level low! Current percentage is:\u0020
